author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

Refactored code to remove use of function local static which only existed to avoid an old compiler complaint.

This fixes a static analyzer warning about the use of a non-const function static variable.

#### PR validation:

Code compiles. Relevant unit tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1403
title: Simplified helpers for edmNew::DetSetVector
